songs.title: Power & Control (Demo Version 2)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Power and control

[Verse 1]
Give a little, get a lot
That’s just how you are with love
Give a little, get a lot
That’s just how you are with love

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna take your self-control
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna make myself feel tall

[Verse 2]
Think you’re funny, think you’re smart
Think you’re gonna break my heart
Think you’re funny, think you’re smart
Yeah, you may be good looking
But you’re not a piece of art

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna take your self-control
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna take your self-control

[Post-Chorus 2]
Come the snow and come the rain
I lost my self-control again
I let you take my breath away
I played your stupid little game
You don’t know what you do to me

[Interlude]
Today, today, but not today
Not today, today, day
Day, day, day

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Power and control
Cause underneath it all

[Outro]
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna make you feel so small
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Fall, fall, fall, fall
